nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples

Class ESightExampleInputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.esight.input.InputHandler
      • nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples.ESightExampleInputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.NEWTEventListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ESightExampleInputHandler
extends InputHandler
implements com.jogamp.newt.event.MouseListener, com.jogamp.newt.event.KeyListener
    Example InputHandler class implementation, that overrides the default mousePressed event. This class uses the Singleton design pattern found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Singleton_pattern
    Author:
    Maarten van Meersbergen
